column1: #mdpijcm Prediction of the Epidemic Peak of Coronavirus Disease in Japan, 2020 @JCM_MDPI
Coronavirus fatalities rise as stocks continue to slide https://youtu.be/yczIrEd2VX0 @YouTubeより

Had that exact thought during my morning shower: striking similarities between the mishandling of "Spanish" Flu by authoritarian, paranoid, secretive gvts during WW1, and ongoing mishandling of #COVID19 by the recent crop of authoritarian, populist, incompetent gvts…

Covid19 is NOT like the flu because: 1. Death rate is .1 for flu and 4-5% for covid19 2. There's no vaccine 3. It's Zoonotic, your pets can get/give it. 4. You can be easily re-infected. 5. It's based on a bat SARS virus and turns your organs into sponge.

So is anyone on Twitter tweeting about their symptoms of COVID19 yet? Odd, I haven't seen anyone but a few ppl joking that they have it. Others you see on TV are whisked away to a quarantine without internet. Seems very weird.
What if Covid19 is another type of seasonal flu, meaning it'll be here with us until next year, or the years to come, esp during winter.

If this turns out to be true then Patanjali will be propelled to global levels. 

Keyword: "IF"
